heading: HR00158
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE ALLEGED INCONSISTENCIES AND FAILURE IN THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE PROVISIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7305, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE MAGNA CARTA OF PUBLIC HEALTH WORKERS, SPECIFICALLY THE PAYMENT OF ALLOWANCES AND BENEFITS TO PUBLIC HEALTH WORKERS (PHWs), WITH THE END IN VIEW OF ADDRESSING THESE POLICY GAPS AND ADOPTING PROGRAMS OF ACTION TO MAKE THE LAW EFFECTIVE, ESPECIALLY IN THE FACE OF THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE UNIVERSAL HEALTH CARE (UHC) ACT
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2019-11-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00158
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE ALLEGED INCONSISTENCIES AND FAILURE IN THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE PROVISIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7305, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE MAGNA CARTA OF PUBLIC HEALTH WORKERS, SPECIFICALLY THE PAYMENT OF ALLOWANCES AND BENEFITS TO PUBLIC HEALTH WORKERS (PHWs), WITH THE END IN VIEW OF ADDRESSING THESE POLICY GAPS AND ADOPTING PROGRAMS OF ACTION TO MAKE THE LAW EFFECTIVE, ESPECIALLY IN THE FACE OF THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE UNIVERSAL HEALTH CARE (UHC) ACT
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TAN, ANGELINA "HELEN" D.L. M.D.
DATE FILED : 2019-07-31
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH ON 2019-11-27
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2019-08-06;
